name: Air of War: Battle Planes 3D
description:
World war is in the air! Meet the ultimate air combat and drive your warplane!

Air radar alert! Enemy airplanes are close to our positions, so you have to assume command and give battle to invaders! Repulse aggressors and enjoy being a pilot of a real military airplane! Air of War: Battle Planes 3D – your chance to feel a fire of war and take part into a great military mission!

You are a pilot of a small but powerful military airplane. Fly through the clouds, try nose dive and other acrobatic maneuvers, aim carefully and shoot! Don’t let you rivals shoot your down.

Air of War: Battle Planes 3D GAME FEATURES:
- Real airplane simulator 3D;
- Planes shooting war;
- Real aircrafts fleet;
- Realistic controls;
- Feel like a real pilot;
- High-quality graphics and sounds.

War is in the air – defeat your opponents and prove you are the best pilot in Air of War: Battle Planes 3D shooting challenge!
